name: auto_fix_simple_bug
description: Missing null check causing error should be auto-fixable

input.title: TypeError when PDF has no pages
input.body:
## Description
When processing a PDF file that has no pages (corrupted or empty), the library throws a TypeError.

## Stack Trace
```
TypeError: 'NoneType' object is not iterable
  at process_pdf in pdf_processor.py
```

## Expected
Should return an empty result or throw a descriptive exception.

## Environment
- Python 3.11
- opendataloader-pdf 1.2.0
